channel.title: Starting the new Aryan
channel.description:
well basicly i will not make it in java :P so then you dun have to update the bot everytime runescape does (unless thats changed)
i have been learning Visual Basic but still a noob at it and i have made my client look pretty like aryan (exept for the skin) i will get the skin lator on when i have learnt Visual Basic for now i onley have a few things...
first thing is the world switcher F1 to bring it up StealRS so yer you cant see the ads and i am currently figuring out to get my bot to open scar scripts and read them and also make it so the scar scripts are silent....
i don't know how detectible it will be but i currently have some1 helping me with silent programs after i figure out the code for silent programs i will be able to figure out how to make my own scripting solution (instead of using silent scar scripts). But if i manage not to make my own scripting solution then i will just use the SCAR and teach people how to make there scripts work on my client Silently
don't get your hopes up becsaue i dun intend to work like a year on this...
thanks. Delrikk

item.title: Starting the new Aryan
item.dc:creator: @Delrikk Delrikk
item.description:
@Delrikk wrote:

yea FOR NOW…
heres the first realease SCAR’s in it
http://www.sythe.org/about59156.html
hope you enjoy
the viking is currently helping me make my own scriptible maro
IT WILL BE SILENT!!! (INVIS MOUSE)

Read full topic

why do people always say “making a new aryan”???

ARYAN DOES NOT HAVE THE SAME MEANING AS BOT FFS!

but good luck making your vb client
